column4: Any one know much abou nvidia geforce graphics card installation
ask and if we do, you'll get an answer
and you don't know which number to install??
wrong way to go about it for a noob..... go to a terminal and type sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx-185
you can also run the script call that keepsake offered
which was in his script call
you need to either reboot or go ctrl+alt+f1, log in the restart gdm
you need to install via command line then....
got another computer to chat on??
well.... you get that error when you try to run the sudo sh command??
well get your pen and paper ready then...
1. ctrl+alt+f1  2. log in  3. sudo stop gdm 4. sudo sh /path/to/file 5. sudo reboot
